entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Valemount

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries changing to periods of rain in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to snow at times heavy after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 05 February 2023
